directions: Mix cream cheese, feta cheese, and butter together in a bowl using your hands; add black olives and green onions. Form mixture into a ball; sprinkle with almonds. Lightly press almonds into cheese ball. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
⅓ cup butter, at room temperature
title: Feta and Almond Cheese Ball
